data.name: Box Cats Puzzle - Halloween
data.detailed_description:
"Box Cats Puzzle-Halloween" adds a new Halloween gameplay~!

About the new gameplay

Three cats of different shapes are randomly generated in each round. You need to put them in the box. If the cats are connected in a line, they will become bats and fly away until the box is full. How many cats can you put in？

Trick or treat

Halloween is coming. Our great lord witch cat comes here. Faithful servants, give your candy quickly. The witch cat will give you happiness ~!

data.short_description: Halloween is coming. Our great lord witch cat comes here. Faithful servants, hand over your candy quickly. The witch cat will give you happiness ~!
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X 10.8 or better
  • Processor: Core Duo 2.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Core Duo 3.2GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Core Duo 2.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Core Duo 3.2GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
